WidgetInfo.Description: A widget to call up a URL into the TaskPane, a new window or HTML element. The MapName and Session ID are automatically added to the URL, as well as any additional parameters specifed.
WidgetInfo.Label: Invoke URL

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Description: If this is a TaskPane widget, this widget will set a URL in the TaskPane to gather user input, otherwise it looks for an HTML element with this name, otherwise it will open a popup window to gather user input.
Parameter.Label: Target

Parameter.Name: Url
Parameter.Description: The URL to be opened in the target
Parameter.Label: URL

Parameter.Name: DisableIfSelectionEmpty
Parameter.Description: A flag to indicate if this widget should only be enabled if there is a selection available on the map
Parameter.Label: DisableIfSelectionEmpty

Parameter.Name: AdditionalParameter
Parameter.Description: A list of key/value pairs that will be added to the URL
Parameter.Label: Additional parameter
